roleset.name: to catch in or as if in a trap, caught
roleset.note: TRAP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls pocket-9.10. (from trap.01-v)
TRAPPED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from trapped.01-j)

example.name: non-agentive
example.text: Now , some see [Mr. Bush]-1 trapped *trace*-1 in a position he is neither comfortable with nor able to escape .
example.arg: in a position he is neither comfortable with nor able to escape

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Weisman predicts [stocks]-1 will appear [*-1]to stabilize in the next few days before [*-1]-2 declining again , [*-2] trapping more investors .
